CustomField.defaultValue: "SENT TO YOU BY: " & $User.FirstName & " " & $User.LastName & " " & $User.Email & " with the DocuSign Electronic Signature Service" & BR() & BR() & "I am sending you this request for your electronic signature, please review and electronically sign by following the link below. " & BR() & BR() & BR() & "Thank You, " & BR() & BR() & $User.FirstName & " " & $User.LastName & " " & $User.Email
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Edit this Email Message Text (up to 2,000 characters) and it will appear in the notification to sign for your DocuSign Recipient.
CustomField.label: DocuSign Email Message
